Getting Started with MCP Welcome to the Multi-Agent Control Platform (MCP) project! This guide will help you set up your development environment and understand the project structure so you can start contributing quickly. What is MCP? MCP is a distributed system that orchestrates multiple specialized agents to perform coordinated tasks. The platform uses a message-based architecture with NATS as the communication backbone, allowing agents written in different languages to work together seamlessly.
